text: Qhaabiil isi toobokoytat abeh yan Qidimih Sabbatah israa-iil xaylol, diggah Sabab maliinoh Nafsi Qide num hinnay umaanet Baaxó baysa num, toysa woo num cagalah Sinam inkih Qideh gide iyyaanam keenil madaqne, Yalli Qidim kak caraamu abe nafsih Qidimik isi waase num, toysa usuk cagalah Sinam inkih Rabak wadeh gide iyyaanam keenil madaqne, Nummah israa-iil xayloh Ni-farmoytit baxxaqqa-le Astooti keenih luk temeete, tohuk lakal diggah keenik maggo mari farmoytit keenih temeetek lakal Baaxô bagul uma taamoomit caddok tatre mara yekken
